long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Explore the Dead Pixels Ghost Club Collection with Every New Tab!

Transform your browsing experience with the Dead Pixels Ghost Tab (DPGTab) extension. Whether you're an art enthusiast or a collector, this unique tool brings creativity and mystery to your day by showcasing NFTs from the Dead Pixels Ghost Club (DPGC) collection with each new tab.

What Does the Extension Offer?

Random Ghost Showcase
↪Every time you open a new tab, a customizable selection of Ghosts from the DPGC collection will appear, giving you a fresh display of art with each click.

Marketplace Integration
↪If the featured Ghost is listed for sale, you’ll get a direct link to its marketplace page. If not, explore more about it on the collection page and enjoy the discovery process.

Showcase Mode
↪Want the artwork to shine on its own? Enable Showcase Mode to remove excess UI elements and let the NFT take center stage, perfect for cycling through the collection with no distractions.

Customization Options
↪Personalize your experience by selecting from a variety of static, animated, or premium backgrounds to accompany your Ghost NFTs. Make every tab a reflection of your style.

Wallet Filtering
↪Want to see only the Ghosts you own? Use the wallet filtering option to display Ghost NFTs tied to a specific Hedera wallet. You can also explore someone else’s collection this way!

Auto-Refresh
↪Keep things dynamic! Set the extension to automatically refresh every 5, 30, or 60 seconds to display a new Ghost NFT in your tab.

Coming Soon: Even More Features!
↪We’re constantly adding new features to enhance your experience. Got an idea? We’d love to hear it! Send your suggestions to hello@dpgt.party—your feedback helps shape the future of this extension.

Privacy and Security You Can Trust
We take your digital safety seriously.

↪No access to your private information
↪No need for private keys
↪No tracking of browsing activities

Want to inspect the code? We believe in transparency. Check it out at https://www.dpgt.party/security.

Discover Dead Pixels Ghost Club
The Dead Pixels Ghost Club (DPGC) is more than just a collection of digital art. It’s a playful community-driven project fueled by creativity and humor, led by a passionate team. Join us in exploring this whimsical world of digital collectibles and make every new tab an artistic experience!
